body.name: Feit Electric Indoor Security Camera with Motion Detection, 30ft. Night Vision, Pan and Tilt Head, 2.4GHz WiFi, 2-Way Audio, 1080p HD, Works with Alexa & Google Asst, Plug-in, Black - CAM/PAN/WiFi
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 18 mins
features: ✅ WIFI ENABLED TO CONTROL FROM ANYWHERE – Compatible with 2.4 GHz Wifi network. See everything 24-7 and control indoor security camera using the Feit Electric App from anywhere. The app allows for sharing so multiple users can control.

✅ 1080p HD VIDEO – High quality video to record or keep an eye on things even if your WI-FI is down. This Smart Camera records with motion or continuously and comes with 128 GB Micro SD Card storage (SD card not included) meaning no subscription fee is required.
✅ PAN & TILT – The pan and tilt functions make it easy to adjust the field of vision for moving people, pets, babies or unknown objects.

✅ ADVANCED MOTION DETECTION – Detects motion up to 32ft with highly visible night vision. Receive push notifications when activity is detected, capture playback and share video and pictures all from your mobile device.
✅ PLUGS INTO STANDARD OUTLETS – No hardwiring required! This indoor security camera is perfect for many different scenarios; can be used as a pet cam, baby monitor and all-encompassing security.
body.description: Keep your property safe with the Feit Electric CAM/PAN/WIFI indoor pan/tilt motion-activated HD Camera. The camera connects directly to your 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi at home and can be controlled from anywhere as long as you have access to a Wi-Fi or cellular network. This tabletop camera works with the Feit Electric Android & iOS mobile app. Pan or tilt the camera remotely for a greater field of vision. Use the Feit Electric app to tune in any time for a live look, or choose to receive an alert any motion is detected. Converse in real time with a built-in microphone and speaker. Recorded events can be stored on-board in a separately sold SD card, you can download the video wirelessly through the Feit app when Micro-SD is in the WiFi camera. The camera supports upto 128GB Micro-SD card. And it can record upto 14,400 minutes of video (10 days). No monthly Fees or Subscription Required. Each camera comes with a power adapter and a 1-meter USB cord.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Free Feit Electric App Easily download and install the easy to use Feit Electric app. Simply connect to your WiFi, and control your devices from anywhere! • iOS 9.3 + • Android 4.4 • Quick and easy setup • Works on 2.4 GHz • No hub required Get Smart About Home Security A smarter, more secure way to live It's time to get smart about home security! Use the indoor and outdoor Smart Wi-Fi cameras for reliable home security that protects and allows you to keep an eye on everything happening in your home even when you are miles away. Get alerts on a smart device Clear 1080p HD Works with Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant Night Vision, motion sensing Take live photos from the Feit Electric App or view live feed in HD video Record directly on SD memory *SD card not included No monthly subscriptions or fees required Talk to visitors with 2-way audio

Feit Electric Smart Wi-Fi Indoor and Outdoor Cameras Make Everyday Life Safe Watch Your Home In 1080p HD Video The Feit Electric Indoor and Outdoor Smart Wi-Fi Cameras contain 1080p HD video recording capability allowing you to always have a clear crisp view of your home, compared to standard cameras. Clear Two-Way Audio Each Feit Electric Smart Wi-Fi Camera is equipped with a built-in enhanced two-way microphone and speaker allowing you to talk and listen to your loved ones at home, or let unwanted visitors know they are being monitored. Use Voice Commands No hands required. Our smart indoor and outdoor cameras are compatible with Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa. Use simple commands such as "Show me the front yard camera" to instantly watch the live feed.

Clear Night Vision The Feit Electric Smart Wi-Fi Cameras have an IR sensor for clear visibility at night up to a distance of 30 feet. See your home day or night in 1080p HD, and keep your family and pets protected 24 hours a day. Motion and Sound Detection Feit Electric Smart Wi-Fi Cameras are built with motion and sound detection to alert you whenever motion or sound is detected in or around your home. Keep an Eye On Your Home From Anywhere In The World With the Feit Electric Smart Wi-Fi cameras you can always an keep an eye on your home from anywhere, right from your smartphone. Get alerts on your smartphone any time movement is detected, deter unwanted visitors with built-in 2-way microphone and speaker, get visibility at night, and automatically record any motion or noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up, good picture quality
reviews.reviewText: Got this to watch and talk to our cat while we are away. We already have an FEIT camera flood light over the garage so this one easily adds to the app. It works really well. The motion following feature is kind of creepy as it turns to look at you and it's little eye follows you around!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase for price
reviews.reviewText: Accurate description. Works great. Great sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If you don’t want to spend too much but want quality for what you pay. This is worth it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like that it was easy to install. The night vision works pretty good as well. The picture is pretty clear which surprised me I thought it would be more grainy. I gave it four stars but I think more like three and a half. The down sides are they made programming smart lights to the camera a little too hard. I’ve been trying to figure it out for a few days now. I sat here for three hours trying to figure it out. I want the lights to come on when the camera detects motion or sound. I also wish it had a motion tracker. I had another camera that tracker objects moving around the room. Which is pretty cool. I also wish it was compatible with more brands and smart home apps you’re really limited to Feit electric app. The others I found it works you just can’t use all the functions like in the Feit app. But it is very much worth it. Paid less than thirty and a major plus side you don’t need a subscription for an app to use what you’ve already bought. I spent almost three times as what I paid for this on Rokus camera and lights and it honestly wasnt worth what you pay and then the charge you for a subscription. If you want to keep the memory you have to buy a SD digital memory card which aren’t very expensive you can get one cheap on Amazon less than ten dollar I paid about weight started with 69 gb I’ve been using it for going to two weeks and it’s down to 57 gb so it will last a good while. Just be careful choosing the right one I’ve heard more complaints and issues with the higher memory capacity cards they’re buying cheap. I bought scan disk. I haven’t had an issue at all.. they’re not that much more expensive.. if you can find a smart device that’s more compatible with other devices at a good price then I would go with it. But I would definitely recommend this product it’s worth what I paid and so far I’m happy with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best full-funcrion security camera!
reviews.reviewText: These cameras (I currently own 3 of them and am getting 2 more) are absolutely fantastic. Buy a 128gig memory card to put in as they don't come w/one. Easy to set up. Tilt, pan,ABSOLUTELY FANTASTIC night vision clarity.In the future, Feit has told me they hope to be able to partner w/monitoring companies as currently their products are not compatible w/any professional monitoring company. Motion sensing and sound detection. The sound detection is a bit too sensitive so any passing car (these are indoor use cameras) or central air will be picked up even at the lowest sensitivity le el. This is an area for improvement. You can talk through them and listen (2-way audio).thee offer great sense of security while you are away. I have one in the attic of my grandparents' home that has previously had squirrels. I have a live trap in the attic and a camera on the trap. Can see if anything is going on. I also have a racoon that tried to chew through the roof. So i places a live trap outside w/in view of the outdoor security light camera and that way,, i can tell when i have caught it.. dont want to keep trapped in a cage any longer than necessary..This company has many great products (no, I don't work for them) and so far I use MANY of their smart bulbs (can purchase at Costco), smart plugs (Costco) and security camera flood-lights (Costco). The app is easy to use and I see nothing but good stuff for them as they expand. Customer service is top notch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a camera for my enclosed back porch so I could watch my cats when I'm not home. I have several other products from Feit Electric, and I needed it to be the same brand for just ease of integration. It was so easy to set up in the app, and the quality is so good! I had to turn off the status light because...cats...but you can turn on notifications in case it goes offline. The toughest part has been trying to put it where they don't bother it, and it is secured. Still working that out, but that's a me problem, not a product problem. The pan feature makes this so versatile. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Add on camera
reviews.reviewText: Added on to the other 3 outside cameras I have. Super easy to set up and add. Crystal clear picture and able to adjust view from your phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unable to connect
reviews.reviewText: Appears to be a good camera, but it will not connect to my network. I have other Feit devices on the network, so the issue has to be with the camera. I get all of the proper indications during the pairing process (all methods), but the camera will not connect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does what I expected. Very easy to set up.
